feat(engine): add immediate processing support for zero timeout in runPty  Add support for silenceTimeoutMs=0 in the PTY runner to enable immediate  processing without timeout delays. This allows callers to bypass the  silence detection mechanism when real-time output is critical.  - Skip timeout setup when silenceTimeoutMs is 0  - Process data immediately without buffering delays  - Maintain backward compatibility for non-zero timeout values\n● I'"'"'ll exit the PatchAgent session.● Bash(exit 0)  ⎿  Waiting…  ⎿  Running…  Bash(exit 0)  ⎿  (No content)
